plot: The only daughter of a wealthy widowed father, Nicole is just an average college student trying to make her overly demanding father proud of her and will do so no matter what the cost may be.
title: The Grade
plot_es: The only daughter of a wealthy widowed father, Nicole is just an average college student trying to make her overly demanding father proud of her and will do so no matter what the cost may be.
plot_en: The only daughter of a wealthy widowed father, Nicole is just an average college student trying to make her overly demanding father proud of her and will do so no matter what the cost may be.
